heading: HB06673
0: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 9 OF REPUBLIC ACT 7941 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PARTY-LIST SYSTEM ACT OF 2010 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSE
status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2020-05-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06673
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 9 OF REPUBLIC ACT 7941 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PARTY-LIST SYSTEM ACT OF 2010 AND FOR OTHER PURPOSE
ABSTRACT : Intends to address the issues on qualifications of nominees who seek to represent a party, sectoral or group interests in the House of Representatives because rightful representation or leadership between or among the nominees are not clarified, which caused to suffer the interest or welfare of the general membership because the declaration has not been timely decided by the COMELEC.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G
DATE FILED : 2020-05-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2020-05-05
